nv.name: Melanocytic nevi
nv.danger_level: Low, but some types have a higher risk of developing into melanoma
nv.symptoms: Brown or black spots on the skin, may be present at birth or develop later in life
nv.risk_factors: Exposure to sunlight, family history of melanoma
nv.prevention: Protect skin from the sun, wear protective clothing, use sunscreen, avoid outdoor activities during peak sun hours
nv.treatment: Usually not required, but may be removed if in a cosmetically sensitive area or if dysplastic
nv.prognosis: Good, but individuals with dysplastic nevi or family history of melanoma should have regular skin examinations

mel.name: Melanoma
mel.danger_level: High, can spread quickly to other parts of the body
mel.symptoms: Asymmetrical mole with irregular borders, changes in color or size, itching or bleeding
mel.risk_factors: Exposure to UV radiation, family history of melanoma, fair skin, history of sunburns
mel.prevention: Protect skin from the sun, avoid tanning beds
mel.treatment: Surgical excision, radiation therapy, immunotherapy, targeted therapy
mel.prognosis: Varies depending on the stage of the cancer at diagnosis, but early detection and treatment are key to a positive prognosis

bkl.name: Benign keratosis
bkl.prevention: Protect skin from the sun, wear protective clothing, use sunscreen, avoid outdoor activities during peak sun hours
bkl.treatment: May be removed if in a cosmetically sensitive area or causing discomfort
bkl.prognosis: Good, as this type of skin growth is usually harmless

bcc.name: Basal cell carcinoma
bcc.danger_level: Low to moderate, can invade surrounding tissues if left untreated
bcc.symptoms: Small, shiny bump or reddish patch of skin that may bleed easily
bcc.risk_factors: Exposure to sunlight, fair skin, history of sunburns, family history of skin cancer
bcc.prevention: Protect skin from the sun, wear protective clothing, use sunscreen, avoid outdoor activities during peak sun hours
bcc.treatment: Surgical excision, cryotherapy, Mohs surgery, radiation therapy
bcc.prognosis: Good, but early detection and treatment are important for a positive outcome

vasc.name: Vascular skin lesions
vasc.symptoms: Red or purple birthmarks or lesions
vasc.treatment: Usually not required, but may be removed for cosmetic reasons
vasc.prognosis: Good, as this type of skin growth is usually harmless

df.name: Dermatofibroma
df.symptoms: Small, hard bump on the skin, may be discolored
df.treatment: Usually not required, but may be removed for cosmetic reasons or if causing discomfort
df.prognosis: Good, as this type of skin growth is usually harmless
